info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 27 at 7:39PM EST until December 27 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EST FOR NORTHEASTERN MONROE...SOUTH CENTRAL BELMONT...SOUTHWESTERN GREENE...NORTHEASTERN WETZEL AND MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 738 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Powhatan Point, or 9 miles south of Moundsville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Powhatan Point, Hundred, Clarington, Aleppo, Cameron, New Freeport, Grove Oak, Proctor, Woodlands, Littleton, Rocklick, and Lynn Camp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
